title: Avodat Yisrael
enDesc: One of the most complex and penetrating of the Hasidic classics. Authored by the Maggid of Kozhnitz, it draws heavily on his Kabbalistic knowledge.
enShortDesc: 19th-century commentary on the Torah and Pirkei Avot by the Maggid of Kozhnitz, Rabbi Yisrael Hopstein.
heShortDesc: פירושים על התורה ועל מסכת אבות שכתב בן המאה ה-19 המגיד מקוזניץ', רבי ישראל הופשטיין.
